home.heading: Developer
home.subHeading: & I code/design things for the web.
home.paragraph: I'm a Developer based in Brazil, fascinated at creating/building exceptional, high-quality websites and applications. My focus is always on modularity, architecture and beautiful design.

about.heading: WHO AM I?
about.first-paragraph: Hello! I'm Kadu, a developer based in Brazil, who enjoys solving problems with tech. I develop exceptional websites and web apps that provide intuitive, pixel-perfect user interfaces with efficient and modern backends.
about.second-paragraph: Shortly after coming back from China,where I was living and working as a English teacher, I started my learning path into computer science and I developed a passion for building things and solving problems.
